emptyScreen.title: No leave allocation has been added for {{year}}
emptyScreen.description: No allocations have been added yet. They will appear here once added

noLeaveError.title: Insufficient Balance
noLeaveError.description: You have no available balance for this leave type in the current year

allocationExpiredError.title: Allocation Expired
allocationExpiredError.description: Allocation for this leave type has expired

noSupervisorError.title: No supervisor has been assigned
noSupervisorError.description: Please contact the administrator regarding your request

errorTexts.commentAndAttachmentRequired: Please enter a comment and upload an attachment

leaveAppliedSuccess.title: Request Submitted
leaveAppliedSuccess.description: Your leave request has been successfully submitted for approval.

leaveAppliedError.title: Oops! Something went wrong
leaveAppliedError.description: Failed to submit the leave request. Please try again.

insufficientBalance.title: Insufficient Balance
insufficientBalance.description: Not enough balance to apply for leave on the selected date/s.

noLeaveEntitlement.title: No Leave Entitlement
noLeaveEntitlement.description: You have no leave entitlements available for the selected date(s)

myLeaveRequests.emptyLeaveRequestDes: You haven't applied for any leave requests yet. Once you submit a request, it will be displayed here.
myLeaveRequests.nudgeSuccessDescription: Your supervisor has been notified about your leave request
myLeaveRequests.nudgeErrorDescription: Failed to nudge the supervisor. Please try again
myLeaveRequests.leaveCancelSuccessDescription: Leave request has been cancelled successfully.
myLeaveRequests.leaveCancelErrorDescription: Failed to cancel the leave. Please try again.
myLeaveRequests.confirmCancelDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel your leave request? Your supervisor will be informed upon confirmation.
myLeaveRequests.leaveRequestCancelledDescription: Your leave request was cancelled and your supervisor was informed.
myLeaveRequests.supervisorNudgedDescription: We sent a notification to your supervisor about your leave request. They’ll get back to you soon, we promise.

leaveTypes.title: Leave Types
leaveTypes.activateLeaveTooltipText: Activate or inactivate the leave type, when inactivated, employees cannot request leaves of this type
leaveTypes.name: Leave type name
leaveTypes.emojiTooltipText: Choose an emoji to quickly identify this leave type.
leaveTypes.leaveDurationPreferencesTooltip: Choose allowed leave durations: Half Day, Full Day, or both.
leaveTypes.halfDayDescription: Leaves can be applied as morning half or evening half
leaveTypes.fullDayDescription: Leaves can be applied for the full-day
leaveTypes.leaveTypeSettingsTooltip: Customize leave type settings by enabling attachments, making them mandatory, and requiring comments.
leaveTypes.maximumCarryForwardDaysTooltip: Define the maximum balance (days) can be carried forward for this leave type
leaveTypes.carryForwardExpirationDateTooltip: Select the expiration date for carrying forward balances. Balances will be eligible for use until this selected date
leaveTypes.emptyLeaveDurationError: Please select a leave duration preference for this leave type
leaveTypes.emptyMaxCarryForwardDaysError: Please enter maximum carry forward days.
leaveTypes.minCarryForwardExpirationDaysError: Please enter a value greater than 0.
leaveTypes.maxCarryForwardExpirationDaysError: Please enter a value less than 360.
leaveTypes.editLeaveTypeErrorToastDescription: Failed to create leave type. Please try again.
leaveTypes.addLeaveTypeErrorToastDescription: Failed to update the leave type. Please try again.
leaveTypes.addLeaveTypeSuccessToastDescription: Leave type has been successfully created.
leaveTypes.editLeaveTypeSuccessToastDescription: The leave type has been successfully updated.
leaveTypes.activateLeaveTypeModalDescription: Activating this leave type will make entitlements allocated under it visible to employees. Would you like to proceed?
leaveTypes.inactivateLeaveTypeModalDescription: All leave entitlements for employees under this leave type will not be visible once inactivated. Remaining balances will be retained and will become visible again if you reactivate. Would you like to proceed?

customLeave.emptyEntitlementsTableDescription: No entitlements have been added yet. Once you add entitlements, they will be displayed here.
customLeave.invalidFractionPointError: Please enter a value that increments by 0.5
customLeave.validityPeriodTooltip: Add a value between 0.5 and 365. You can increase by 0.5
customLeave.requireNoOfDaysError: Please enter a number of days
customLeave.validNoOfDaysRangeError: Please enter a value between 0.5 and 365
customLeave.validNoOfDaysUpperRangeError: Please select a value less than 360
customLeave.validNoOfDaysLowerRangeError: Please enter a value of 0.5 or greater

emptySearchResult.title: No results found
emptySearchResult.description: No results found for the requested search query. Please retry.

emptyCustomLeaveScreen.title: No allocations available
emptyCustomLeaveScreen.description: No custom leave allocations have been added yet. Once you add allocations, they will be displayed here.

customLeave.deleteLeaveAllocationModalDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this leave allocation?
customLeave.unsavedChangesAddModalDes: You are about to leave your current task, and any unsaved changes will be lost. Do you wish to resume your task or leave anyway?
customLeave.customLeaveAllocationSuccessDes: Custom allocation has been successfully added.
customLeave.customLeaveAllocationFailDes: Failed to add the custom allocation. Please try again.
customLeave.editSuccessToastTitle: Custom allocation has been successfully updated.
customLeave.deleteSuccessDescription: Custom allocation has been deleted successfully.
customLeave.updateSuccessDescription: Custom allocation has been updated successfully.
customLeave.updateErrorDescription: The number of days cannot be lower than the used days.
customLeave.validNoOfDaysFullDayError: Selected leave type only allows full-day leaves
customLeave.validNoOfDaysIncrementError: Please enter a value in increments of 0.5
customLeave.fromDateMustBeBeforeToDate: The expiration date must be later than the effective date

leaveEntitlements.title: Leave Entitlements
leaveEntitlements.downloadCsvModalDes: Download the CSV template, fill in the entitlements you wish to add to the organization, and then upload the completed file.
leaveEntitlements.uploadCsvModalDes: Upload the CSV template with updated employee leave information.
leaveEntitlements.emptyFileError: No records found. Please try again.
leaveEntitlements.invalidTemplateError: Invalid file. Please use the provided template.
leaveEntitlements.overrideConfirmationModalDes: You have already added entitlements for the year {{uploadingYear}}. Uploading new entitlements for this year will override the existing ones. You will not be able to revoke this decision.
leaveEntitlements.overrideConfirmationTxt: Are you sure you want to proceed?

emptySearchResult.title: No results found
emptySearchResult.description: No results found for the requested search query. Please retry.

emptyScreen.title: No entitlements available for {{selectedYear}}
emptyScreen.description: No entitlements have been added yet. Once you add entitlements, they will be displayed here.

toastMessages.bulkUploadCompleteSuccessDescription: All records have been uploaded successfully.
toastMessages.bulkUploadErrorDescription: Failed to upload the entitlements. Please try again.

leaveManagerEmployee.EnterWhyDecline: Please enter why you are declining this leave request.
leaveManagerEmployee.proceedToCancelLeave: Proceed to cancel the requested leave. The supervisor will be informed of your cancellation.
leaveManagerEmployee.approvedLeaveRevoke: Approved leave will be revoked and notification will be sent to the employee. Leave entitlements will be updated.
leaveManagerEmployee.whyRevokeLeave: Why do you want to revoke the leave
leaveManagerEmployee.enterRevokeReason: Please enter why you want to revoke the leave
leaveManagerEmployee.yourLeaveRequestSubmitted: Your leave request has been submitted. A notification will be sent once your supervisor has reviewed.
leaveManagerEmployee.approveAreaLabel: Pressing enter on this button will approve the leave request.
leaveManagerEmployee.cancelAreaLabel: Pressing enter on this button will open the decline lave modal. In that modal you can decline the leave request

leaveManagerEmployee.noSearchResults: The following search is either not assigned to you or does not exist in the organization

leaveManagerEmployee.declineLeaveFailDesc: Failed to decline the request. Please try again.

leaveReports.title: Reports
leaveReports.emptyScreenDescription: We couldn't find any matches for your search. Please adjust your filter criteria and try again.

leaveCarryForward.name: NAME
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardSectionDescription: Sync eligible carried forward leave balances of the entire organization to the next leave cycle.
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardSuccessToastDescription: Carried Forward Leave balances have been synced successfully.
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardFailToastDescription: Failed to sync the balances. Please try again.
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardModalDescription: This action will synchronize eligible carried forward leave balances of all employees to the next leave cycle. Note that this will impact the current leave balances of the employees. Are you sure you want to proceed?
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardTypeSelectionModalDescr: Please select the leave types that you wish to carry forward to the next leave cycle
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardUnEligibleModalTitle: No eligible leave balances to sync
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardUnEligibleModalDescript: There are no leave balances that meet the eligibility criteria for being carried forward.
leaveCarryForward.leaveCarryForwardLeaveTypesNotAvailableM: No carried forward enabled leave types available.
There are no carried forward enabled leave types available for synchronization. Please ensure that the appropriate leave types are enabled before proceeding.
leaveCarryForward.noTimeEntryDes: There are no carry forward records

pendingRequests.title: Pending Leave Requests
pendingRequests.RequestApproveFailDescription: Failed to approve the request. Please try again.
pendingRequests.RequestDeclineFailDescription: Failed to decline the request. Please try again.
